      public void commonCompleted(String msg, String whoCompleted, boolean first)
      Notifies if someone completed a common goal card and gives them their points.
      Parameters:
      msg - message to be shown.
      whoCompleted - player who completed the common.
      first - true only if it's the first common goal card of the game, false otherwise.
